name: alluvion_tag_app
description: App that converts excel files(.xsl) to tags that are printed on a CL4NX printer

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --success first "npm run dev:react" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:electron: cross-env ELECTRON_DEV=true wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron . && kill-port 5173
scripts.build: cd renderer && npm run build && electron-builder

author: Trent Matsushima
